name: Tonkatsu or Chicken Katsu (Japanese Breaded Pork or Chicken Cutlets)
ingredientLines: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, about 8 ounces (225g) each; or 4 boneless, skinless chicken thighs, 4 to 5 ounces (110 to 140g) each; or 4 boneless pork sirloin cutlets, 4 to 5 ounces (110 to 140g) each

2 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, about 8 ounces (225g) each; or 4 boneless, skinless chicken thighs, 4 to 5 ounces (110 to 140g) each; or 4 boneless pork sirloin cutlets, 4 to 5 ounces (110 to 140g) each
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
